start.text: Once upon a time, Harper and Emerie found a magical door in the backyard. Do they open it?

forest.text: They step into a glowing forest! A talking bunny asks for help finding its carrot. Do they help?

home.text: They stay home and bake cookies. Yum! The End.

carrot.text: They find the carrot floating in a bubble. The bunny gives them a shiny gem!

glow_mushroom.text: They follow a glowing mushroom into the candy woods!
